channel.title: finite element method on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in finite element method on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] 1次元移流方程式を有限要素法で解いてみる.py
item.description: Let's solve the one-dimensional advection equation by the stabilized finite element method based on the SUPG (Streamline Upwind/Petrov-Galerkin) method. The language is Python. The version used is Python 3.6.1. References: Computational Mechanics (2nd Edition)-Basics of Finite Element Method (Morikita Publishing) Third edition Flow simulation by finite element method With Fortran source code based on OpenMP (Maruzen Publishing) One-dimensional advection equation The one-dimensional advection equation is expressed by the first-order partial differential equation as follows.
